dr.evolution.distance
Class DistanceMatrix

java.lang.Object
  dr.matrix.Matrix.AbstractMatrix
      dr.evolution.distance.DistanceMatrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaxonList, Matrix, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Taxon>
Direct Known Subclasses:
F84DistanceMatrix, JukesCantorDistanceMatrix, PatristicDistanceMatrix, SMMDistanceMatrix
public class DistanceMatrix
extends Matrix.AbstractMatrix
implements TaxonList

storage for pairwise distance matrices.
